text: These warriors are highly experienced and proficient fighters

Top of his marksmanship class at the Nuln Artillery College for a record three years running, Wolfgang 'Sureshot' Swartzkopf instils winning confidence in the rest of his crew. After proving himself in the field he had a short stint as a lecturer in ballistics before being offered service with the mighty Great Cannon regiment.
